   This is a timeline of environmental history of New Zealand. It includes notable events affecting the natural environment of New Zealand as a result of human activity. 14th century- 16th century 1642 1769 1837 1840 1860 1861 1864 1867 1870 1875 1876 1879 1882 1885 1887 1890 1893 1894 1897 1900 1901 1903 1904 1907 1907 1921 1923 1929 1936 1941 1942 1946 1948 1949 1952 1953 1954 1964 1965 1967 1967 1970 1971 1972 1973 1974 1975 1976 1977 1978 1979 1980 1982 1983 1984 1985 1986 1987 1989 1990 1991 1993 1994 1996 1997 1998 1999 2000 2001 2002 2003 2004 2005 2006 2007 2008 2013 2014 2015
